attributes.action: call a general election within 3 months of Blairs stepping down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hearby call on this government to call a general election on the resignation of the prime minister in accordance to the same call made by the opposition in 1990 when the then PM stepped down mid term

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
